name: Sokoliminal
description:
Welcome to a sokoban with mechanics inspired by quantum mechanics such as entanglement and superposition.

Use the arrow keys / WASD to move and to navigate the menus.

Z to undo

X, Space, or Enter to select

R to restart

CrateCrates can be pushed.
Spiked CrateSpiked crates kill you if you approach
them from the spiked side.
Quantum Crate
Disappear when you stop looking at them;
and reappear when you stop looking at the
space they were in.
Paired Crate
Paired crates move together.GoalComplete a level by reaching this space.

Game design and development by me, Lionel Miele-Herndon
Music by Godmode
Sounds by InspectorJ, diakunik, stecman, & steeltowngaming
Follow me on Twitter @onygox
